csw.services.ts

Interface TimeService.TimeServiceScheduler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTimeServiceScheduler, DiagPublisher, DiagPublisher, HCDExample, HCDExample.PosGenerator, JavaTimeServiceScheduler, JTimeServiceScheduler, MotionWorker, SingleAxisSimulator, SingleAxisSimulator
    Enclosing class:
    TimeService

    public static interface TimeService.TimeServiceScheduler
    TimeServiceSchedule provides a component actor with timed messages

    scheduleOnce - sends a message to an actor once some time in the future

    schedule - waits until a specific time and then sends periodic message to an actor until cancelled

    Must extend an Actor with ActorLogging

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      scala.concurrent.ExecutionContextExecutor ec() 
      akka.actor.Cancellable schedule(java.time.LocalTime startTime, java.time.Duration period, akka.actor.ActorRef receiver, java.lang.Object message)
      Schedule a message to be sent periodically to an actor starting at a future time.
      akka.actor.Cancellable scheduleOnce(java.time.LocalTime startTime, akka.actor.ActorRef receiver, java.lang.Object message)
      Schedule a message to be sent once to an actor at a future time.

    • Method Detail

      • ec

        scala.concurrent.ExecutionContextExecutor ec()

      • scheduleOnce

        akka.actor.Cancellable scheduleOnce(java.time.LocalTime startTime,
                                    akka.actor.ActorRef receiver,
                                    java.lang.Object message)
        Schedule a message to be sent once to an actor at a future time. Uses Java 8 java.time types.

        Parameters:
        startTime - a LocalTime when the message should be sent
        receiver - an actorRef for an actor that will receive the message
        message - some message to be sent
        Returns:
        a Cancellable that can be used to cancel the timer

      • schedule

        akka.actor.Cancellable schedule(java.time.LocalTime startTime,
                                java.time.Duration period,
                                akka.actor.ActorRef receiver,
                                java.lang.Object message)
        Schedule a message to be sent periodically to an actor starting at a future time. The scheduler must be cancelled to stop the message. Uses Java 8 java.time types.

        Parameters:
        startTime - a LocalTime when the first message should be sent
        period - the Duration between messages
        receiver - an actorRef for an actor that will receive the message
        message - some message to be sent
        Returns:
        a Cancellable that can be used to cancel the timer
